Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to Special Summon this card has no type and does not start a Chain.\n2. The effect to destroy 1 card targets that card. It is an Ignition Effect.\n3. Tributing another 'Six Samurai' monster is a cost.

PSCT.Base: If you control "Legendary Six Samurai - Shinai", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn: You can Tribute another face-up "Six Samurai" monster, then target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.
